| History                 = The Sapien League was formed as a human terrorist group whose aim was to attack and kill [[Homo superior|mutants]] when possible. After the events of [[Decimation|M-Day]], the Sapien League attacked the Xavier Institute but were defeated by the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and [[Sentinel Squad O*N*E (Earth-616)|O.N.E.]]{{Citation}} They also sent members after the former X-Men [[Alexander Summers (Earth-616)|Havok]] and [[Lorna Dane (Earth-616)|Polaris]] for reasons unknown.{{Citation}}

The Sapien League has also targeted other non-human entities, like the robot [[Ward (Earth-616)|Ward]]. They attacked him and [[John Cray (Earth-616)|John Cray]] at the diner [[Route 66 Burger]]. The [[Soul Stone]] made landfall and bind itself to Ward, and the energy discharge knocked out the terrorists.{{r|Avengers Annual Vol 5 1}}
